title: Dhruv’s STA 9750 Website
text:
I am a data-driven thinker and a student at Baruch College, currently taking STA 9750. This site will be my digital notebook for the course, showcasing my projects, experiments, and insights in statistical analysis and data science.
Through this journey, I aim to develop stronger analytical skills, improve my ability to communicate data insights, and apply real-world statistical techniques using R and Quarto.




✅ 📊 Mini-Projects - Real-world data science challenges
✅ 📚 Course Assignments - My approaches & learnings
✅ 📝 Blog & Reflections - Sharing insights & lessons
✅ ✨ Additional Learning Resources - References & tools that helped me




🚧 Coming Soon: A deep dive into [a specific project/topic]. Stay tuned! 🚧





📈 R, Quarto & Data Visualization
📊 Statistical Modeling & Inference
🔍 Hypothesis Testing & Data Exploration
🛠️ Git, GitHub & Version Control





Aside from statistics and data, I enjoy [hobby/interests, e.g., gaming, photography, AI research, hiking, etc.]! I believe that storytelling through data is one of the most powerful ways to make an impact in today’s world.





🏠 GitHub: My Repository
🏠 GitHub: My Repository
📧 Email: your-email@example.com
🔗 LinkedIn: Your LinkedIn Profile





I’ll be updating this website frequently, so make sure to check back soon for more insights, projects, and analysis!

“Data is the new oil, but insights are the fuel that drive the world forward.” - Anonymous
